jobDescription: Hi, we’re Second Genome. We are a fast-paced and innovative venture-backed biotechnology company developing tomorrow’s breakthrough therapeutics at the interface of complex microbial communities and their host environments. We are leaders in microbial ecology, metagenomics, and computer science. We love fresh approaches, we value process validation, and we welcome peer review. And we’re looking for a Bioinformatics Intern. We’re looking for an intern to help improve our ability to accurately identify bacterial strains from metagenomics datasets. Throughout this project, this intern will evaluate several approaches to strain identification, modify an existing codebase to implement new features, and continually test the code. The ideal candidate will have experience working with Illumina sequencing data and is proficient with Python and coding with a team. Please include a link to a git repo with code you’ve written and a brief description of a coding project you’re proud of in your CV or cover letter. In addition to our ground-breaking technology, we believe in embodying an authentically joyful workplace. Our Core Values: We are InnovatorsWe are Driven to ActionWe are Great ColleaguesWe Work SmartWe Respect the Data We understand and appreciate the hard work and emotional investment on the part of all our team members - it takes a lot to be a contributor at a startup that’s leading its industry. We make it a priority to mindfully design our work environment and employee offerings with our unique and dedicated team in mind.
